sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container fluid>
    <v-row align="center">
      <v-select :items="items" label="Select Vehicle Type" solo></v-select>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>


<script>
export default {

  data: () => {
    items: ['Foo', 'Bar', 'Fizz', 'Buzz']
    return {
      value: 0,
    };
  },
  methods: {
    change(e) {
      this.value = e.target.value;
      this.update();
    },
    update() {
      if (this.ikey) this.putData(this.ikey, this.value);
      this.emitter.trigger("process");
    },
  },
  mounted() {
    this.value = this.getData(this.ikey);
  },
};
</script>

<style scoped>
select,
input {
  width: 100%;
  border-radius: 30px;
  background-color: white;
  padding: 2px 6px;
  border: 1px solid #999;
  font-size: 110%;
  width: 170px;
}
</style>
